org.bluezoo.gumdrop.dns.DNSType

    Package Description
    org.bluezoo.gumdrop.dns
    DNS server implementation for Gumdrop.

      Modifier and Type Method Description
      static DNSType DNSType.fromValue​(int value)
      Returns the DNSType for the given numeric value.

      Returns the record type being queried.

      Returns the record type.

      Returns the enum constant of this type with the specified name.
      static DNSType[] DNSType.values()
      Returns an array containing the constants of this enum type, in the order they are declared.
